about_the_game:
Tiny Tales Code Ark is designed for those who are looking to add a futuristic, epic touch to their game. In CodeArk UI Assets, we bring you a selection of UI elements, buttons and skins with stylish futuristic themes to enhance the visuals of your game!

Contents:

- Windowskins compatible with RPG Maker in several sizes!
- Custom Buttons for Mobile UI
- Several Window Frames, Skins and textures!
- Keyboard buttons!
- UI Mini Icons and Gauges to customize!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
